webDictionary.js.name: webDictionary.js
webDictionary.js.description: webDictionary.js file. This file contains the webDictionary definitions

comment.js_anonymous.name: comment.js_anonymous
comment.js_anonymous.description:
The class that holds the variables and functions created in the namespace of this file.
The constrcutor of this object is only called once, because it is an anonymous function.

The functions defined in this class are later added to the MARKUS global object and can
from that point on be called as `markus.comments.FUNCTION_NAME`

params.name: _m
params.description: a reference to the Markus Configuration Object is passed

Comment.name: Comment
Comment.description:
This class' method are defined in the above anonymous class of this file and
are only reassigned here.

Make all the functions that have been defined above availabe through
markus.comment.FUNCTION, to allow calling of them throughout the DOM

Global.name: Global
Global.description: The global namespace. This is the Global namespace in **all** the files

Data.name: Data
Data.description:
Here the Markus.Data methods are defined and added to the Global Markus Singleton.
The Data methods handle mostly data conversion

helpInfo.js_anonymous.name: helpInfo.js_anonymous
helpInfo.js_anonymous.description:
The class that holds the variables and functions created in the namespace of this file.
The constrcutor of this object is only called once, because it is an anonymous function.

params.name: _m
params.description: a reference to the Markus Configuration Object is passed

io.js_anonymous.name: io.js_anonymous
io.js_anonymous.description:
The class that holds the variables and functions created in the namespace of this file.
The constrcutor of this object is only called once, because it is an anonymous function.

The functions defined in this class are later added to the MARKUS global object and can
from that point on be called as `markus.io.FUNCTION_NAME`

params.name: _m
params.description: a reference to the Markus Configuration Object is passed

IO.name: IO
IO.description:
Defines the `markus.io` object that can be accessed globally. Uses some functions that have
been defined in the io.js anonymous namespace, but also defines some functions in the object
creation itself.

manualMarkup.js_anonymous.name: manualMarkup.js_anonymous
manualMarkup.js_anonymous.description:
The class that holds the variables and functions created in the namespace of this file.
The constrcutor of this object is only called once, because it is an anonymous function.

params.name: _m
params.description: a reference to the Markus Configuration Object is passed

ManualMarkup.name: ManualMarkup
ManualMarkup.description:
Defines the `markus.manualMarkup` object that can be accessed globally. Uses some functions that have
been defined in the manualMarkup.js anonymous namespace, but also defines some functions in the object
creation itself.

navbar.js_anonymous.name: navbar.js_anonymous
navbar.js_anonymous.description:
The class that holds the variables and functions created in the namespace of this file.
The constrcutor of this object is only called once, because it is an anonymous function.

params.name: _m
params.description: a reference to the Markus Configuration Object is passed

switcher.js_anonymous.name: switcher.js_anonymous
switcher.js_anonymous.description:
The class that holds the variables and functions created in the namespace of this file.
The constrcutor of this object is only called once, because it is an anonymous function.

params.name: _m
params.description: a reference to the Markus Configuration Object is passed

ColorSwitcher.name: ColorSwitcher
ColorSwitcher.description:
Creates the `markus.ui.colorSwitcher` class. This class has only one method:
`regist(target, buttonSelector, doc)`.

tagRegex.js_anonymous.name: tagRegex.js_anonymous
tagRegex.js_anonymous.description:
The class that holds the variables and functions created in the namespace of this file.
The constrcutor of this object is only called once, because it is an anonymous function.

params.name: _m
params.description: a reference to the Markus Configuration Object is passed

Regex.name: Regex
Regex.description:
Creates the Regex class, that holds just one function: `translate`.
This translate function assembles a regular Expression based on the input.

ui.js_anonymous.name: ui.js_anonymous
ui.js_anonymous.description:
The class that holds the variables and functions created in the namespace of this file.
The constrcutor of this object is only called once, because it is an anonymous function.

Some of the functions defined in this class are later added to the MARKUS global object and can
from that point on be called as `markus.ui.FUNCTION_NAME`

params.name: _m
params.description: a reference to the Markus Configuration Object is passed

UI.name: UI
UI.description:
Creates the markus.ui object and associates its member varaible listener with
the predefined listener variable from the ui.js_anonymous class. You can use this
class to gain access to the keyPress listener that was registered here.

utilities.js_anonymous.name: utilities.js_anonymous
utilities.js_anonymous.description:
The class that holds the variables and functions created in the namespace of this file.
The constrcutor of this object is only called once, because it is an anonymous function.

params.name: _m
params.description: a reference to the Markus Configuration Object is passed

Util.name: Util
Util.description: The class that holds all the utility functions. This class is only declared once (technically a singleton).

webDictionary.js_anonymous.name: webDictionary.js_anonymous
webDictionary.js_anonymous.description:
The class that holds the variables and functions created in the namespace of this file.
The constrcutor of this object is only called once, because it is an anonymous function

params.name: _m
params.description: a reference to the Markus Configuration Object is passed

WebDictionary.name: WebDictionary
WebDictionary.description:
Web dictionary module handles the interaction between tab, input, spinner and iframe interactions.
    It does basic iframe URL construction from input value.

classitems.description:
Finds all comments for this element, stores their text contents into an array,
and sets this array as value atribute (after Unicode Escaping) for the `span`
comment Container. Finally it triggers a click event on the commentIcon span
classitems.name: saveComment

classitems.description:
Handles the removing of a comment. It first removes the comment, and then
resaves all the ones that are still left.
classitems.name: removeAnySync

params.name: event
params.description: The event Object that is passed

classitems.description:
Enables the editing of the provided comment. It starts the editing of it
by setting the panel-body to contenteditable and chaning the edit to a save
button.
classitems.name: edit

params.name: event
params.description: the propagated event from the DOM

classitems.description: Saves the current commentField. It escape Unicode Characters
classitems.name: save

params.name: event
params.description: The event that is passed from the DOM

classitems.description:
Called upon parsing of the document to parse the comment UI from the data in the html
document. This goes through all the comments and sanitizes them.
classitems.name: startAddingCommentHolder

classitems.description:
Adds all the UI Event handles for the Comment UI. This class links the UI to
the functions behind the scenes.
classitems.name: registerCommentUI

classitems.description: Defines what happens when you click the commentIcon. It generates a new commentHolder
classitems.name: registerCommentIcon

classitems.description:
Returns an array that, depending on the provided parameters will return the
markups in the passage or in the whole document. And depending on the Boolean flag
withSupportText it returns its surrounding text.
classitems.name: getMarkupsArray

params.name: withPassage
params.description: Do we want to include the passage

params.name: withSupportText
params.description: Do we want to include support Text

params.name: noOfChars
params.description: The number of chars to get

classitems.description: Turns an array of objects into a CSV array.
classitems.name: objArrayToCSV

params.name: objArray
params.description: the array to turn into a CSV

classitems.description: Turns an array of objects into a TSV array.
classitems.name: objArrayToTSV

params.name: objArray
params.description: the array to turn into a TSV

classitems.description: Returns the provided array as a HTML table.
classitems.name: objArrayToHTML

params.name: objArray
params.description: the array of objects we want to convert

classitems.description:
In this method we load the specific help template according to the language
cookie.
classitems.name: loadHelpInfo

classitems.description: Registers the eventHandlers for the help menu.
classitems.name: registHelp

classitems.description:
Defines what happens when you click the sampleMarkup. Basically, creates contents
and shows/hides things depending on what you clicked.
classitems.name: sampleMarkupClicked

params.name: event
params.description: the event that is passed from the DOM (i.e. the mouse click)

classitems.description:
Creates an error Handler function. This function prints out the error message
prefaced by 'Error', to make it easier to spot in the console log.
classitems.name: ERROR_HANDLER

params.name: e
params.description: The error that has happened

classitems.description:
Updates the color switchers for the tagNames. This is called on load. It
hides or shows buttons depending on their visibility and changes the color-switcher-class
based on their status

This method is defined in the io.js anonymous function but later attached to the `markus.io` object
classitems.name: updateSwitchers

classitems.description:
Updates the .singleTagContent in the manualPopover. It handles their visibility
based on the 'visible' property and sets the button text according to either
the tagName or a predefined buttonName that can override the tagName.

This method is defined in the io.js anonymous function but later attached to the `markus.io` object
classitems.name: updateManualPopover

classitems.description:
This method generates all the necessary CSS classes for a new tagType. It will Also
overwrite already existing definitions so you can use this to redefine the styling of existing
tags too.

This method is defined in the io.js anonymous function but later attached to the `markus.io` object
classitems.name: newTagCSS

params.name: tagName
params.description: the name of the tagClass we want to generate in CSS

params.name: buttonName
params.description: the name we want the button to have for this tagCSS

params.name: tagColor
params.description: 16 bit hex color (e.g. ``#FF0000` = red.) you can use css shortcuts like `red` or `#f00`

classitems.description:
Called before defining new CSS rules for a tagType. This removes any pre-existing rules for
the provided tagType from the markus.tag and markus.tagCSS objects.

This method is defined in the io.js anonymous function but later attached to the `markus.io` object
classitems.name: removeTagCSS

params.name: tagName
params.description: The tag you want to remove

classitems.description:
This function handles the loading of the CSS rules from the saved HTML document using
the tag and tagCSS attributes. It has a couple of failsafes in case the data is missing
and also contains the defaults for the standard tagNames (i.e. placeName, officialTitle, timePeriod etc.)

This method is defined in the io.js anonymous function but later attached to the `markus.io` object
classitems.name: loadCSSFromCSS_TagAtt

classitems.description:
Calling this method automates the download/export of the file. This generates
a click event on the `#export` button
classitems.name: autoDownload

params.name: fileEntry
params.description: The fileEntry object that contains the file

params.name: suffix
params.description: Filetype extension as String, or just a suffix

classitems.description:
Calling this method will clean the data from the document into a newly spawned,
temporary element to use JQuery to clean it from unwanted elements and classes
classitems.name: saveSave

params.name: filename
params.description: the fileName for the new File

params.name: _fn
params.description: The fileEntry object

classitems.description: Generates a TEI XML document from the HTML document that is generated in the browser.
classitems.name: saveTEI

params.name: filename
params.description: the fileName for the new File

classitems.description:
Generates a standalone HTML document that you can view offline. This has all the data from the
document stored in it, including the stylesheet CSS rules that have been parsed into one single
`<style>` tag in the head of the HTML document.
classitems.name: saveHTML

params.name: filename
params.description: the name of the new file

classitems.description:
Saves a file using the FileSystem. It requests write access and in return Gets
a fileEntry (basically a filePointer) that can be written to. Once we have that object
we write all the data that needs to be saved to there and call the callback function once the
writing of data is complete
classitems.name: saveFile

params.name: filename
params.description: the name of the file we want to create

params.name: text
params.description: the textdata of the file we want to create

params.name: _fn
params.description: the callback function, called once the file has been written

params.name: errorHandler
params.description: A custom errorHandler, does not need to specified, can also be kept default

classitems.description: Removes the specified file from the fileSystem.
classitems.name: removeFile

params.name: filename
params.description: the name of the file we want to remove

params.name: _fn
params.description: the callback function, called once the file has successfully been removed

params.name: errorHandler
params.description: the errorHandler, does not need to be defined, can fallback to default handler

classitems.description:
Defines the readFile function. This allows you to read a file specified by the fileName
and calls the callback on succes
classitems.name: readFile

params.name: _file
params.description: the fileName as a String

params.name: _fn
params.description: The callBack function

params.name: errorHandler
params.description: custom error handler

classitems.description: Exports a MARKUS save file and automatically saves it
classitems.name: exportSave

params.name: filename
params.description: the fileName of the file you download

classitems.description: Exports a TEI save file of the document and automatically saves it
classitems.name: exportTEI

params.name: filename
params.description: the fileName of the file you download

classitems.description: Exports a HTML save of the document and its layout and automatically saves it
classitems.name: exportHTML

params.name: filename
params.description: the fileName of the file you download

classitems.description:
A simple basic save to the normal MARKUS format. Cleans the data, processes it
for download and then automatically downloads it.
classitems.name: save

params.name: filename
params.description: The filename of the new file we want to create

params.name: _fn
params.description: The callback function called uppon completion

classitems.description:
Global method that registers the Global Tag Management UI, it also takes care of all its
event handlers etc.
classitems.name: registeTagManageUI

classitems.description: This function cleans the class attribute of the element this is called on.
classitems.name: registMakupAction

params.name: justAdd
params.description: one of the spans that still has the justAdd class

classitems.description:
Called when we have a new type of markup to save. We set the classes on
the corresponding element, and fadeout the `singleTagContent` css class
elements. Also shows the `.search` element at the end of the function.
classitems.name: newtypeSave

classitems.description:
Function called when either `applyAllBtn` or `removeAllBtn` has fired
and event and we want to process it. This just removes the `fired` class
from both of those buttons if present.
classitems.name: initialRemoveModal

classitems.description: Shows and or hides the `#removeModal` and the `#removeAll` and `#applyAll` buttons
classitems.name: updateRemoveModal

classitems.description: Shows the just created markup instance. Sets the classes of the markup element.
classitems.name: showManualMarkup

classitems.description:
Handles the registering of manual markup. Handles the necessary registering
of event handlers and takes care of the selection from the document.
classitems.name: registManualMarkup

params.name: editable
params.description: An editable object

classitems.description: This is the global object that holds the version and build info
classitems.name: markus

classitems.description:
New JQuery function definition. Scrolls to the element that is passed
as a parameter.
Example Usage:
  `$('#div_element2').goTo();`
*Source:*
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4801655/how-to-go-to-a-specific-element-on-page
classitems.name: goto

params.name: element
params.description: the element we want to scroll to

classitems.description:
New JQuery function definition. Replaces all elements passed to this functions
with the specified element name.

Example Usage:
``$('div').replaceTagName('span');`

*Source:*
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2815683/jquery-javascript-replace-tag-type
classitems.name: replaceTagName

params.name: replaceWith
params.description: the string you want to replace the element name with

classitems.description:
Defines the loadNavBar function that will later be register to the `markus.navbar.register`
functions.

This function defines all the behaviour of the navBar and the registers all the listeners to
the NavBar UI objects.

Please read through the source to understand what the actual navBar buttons do.
classitems.name: loadNavBar

classitems.description:
Registers what a color switcher does when it is clicked. When you click a
color switcher it switches through the different states of color:
`.noColor`, `.bordered`, no CSS class and back to `noColor` to complete the loop.
classitems.name: regist

params.name: target
params.description: the colorSwitcher element

params.name: buttonSelector
params.description: Selector, only triggers color switch if this one is clicked

params.name: doc
params.description: Reference to the document to find all other instances of this class

classitems.description: Global function that registers the base color switcher
classitems.name: registColorSwitcher

classitems.description: A function that returns a regular expresion based on the input
classitems.name: tagRegexReplace

params.name: a
params.description: UNUSED

params.name: b
params.description: The tag name

classitems.description: Holds the regular expression pattern used to match against
classitems.name: tagRegexPat

classitems.description: Translates one regular expression into another by replacing parts of it.
classitems.name: translate

params.name: tagRegex
params.description: the unmodified regular expression you want to translate

classitems.description:
Create a new keyPress listener that listens to all keypresses in the whole window,
regardless of focus element. This object holds that listener
classitems.name: listener

classitems.description:
This method will transfer your focus from the currently selected markup instance
to the next one in the document with the same type.
classitems.name: nextSameTypeMarkup

classitems.description:
Finds the next markup after the currently selected markup instance and will transfer
the focus by generating a click on the next element. This is markup_type agnostic.
classitems.name: nextMarkup

params.name: _sameType
params.description: This Parameter is currently unused. TODO: Remove it, or fix it

classitems.description:
Finds the previous markup before the currently selected markup instance and will transfer
the focus by generating a click on the previous element. This is markup_type agnostic.
classitems.name: lastMarkup

classitems.description:
Finds the previous markup before the currently selected markup instance and will transfer
the focus by generating a click on the previous element. This will only go through the instances
of the same markup_type.
classitems.name: lastSameTypeMarkup

classitems.description:
Escapes all unicode characters in the source that is passed as parameter and
returns the modified string.
classitems.name: convertToEscapeUnicode

params.name: source
params.description: source

classitems.description:
Converts a unicode-escaped string generated using the `convertToEscapeUnicode` function back
to its unicode original. Pass a unicode-escaped string and get the unicode encoded string back.
classitems.name: converBackToUnicode

params.name: text
params.description: the unicode-escaped string

return.description: the string containing unicode characters once again

classitems.description:
This is the default error handler. According to previous code documentation this function should be
moved to the `IO` package. This function does nothing but print 'Error: ' in front of the logging message
in the console.
classitems.name: ERROR_HANDLER

params.name: e
params.description: the error that is encountered.

classitems.description: This method will convert a Chinese character string to Ping Yin.
classitems.name: chineseToPingYin

params.name: chineseString
params.description: A string of Chinese Characters

return.description: A string of Chinese annotated in Ping Yin

classitems.description:
Reads the URL parameters that are included in the location (A.K.A the URL request bar
in the top of your browser. The address bar). Using this function you can request `GET` variables
classitems.name: urlParam

params.name: param
params.description: the name of the parameter we want to extract from the GET variables

return.description: the value of the parameter (probably URL encoded) as a String.

classitems.description:
Used to sort two comparable regex strings. This function is called  by
`array.sort`
classitems.name: sortMergerdRegex

params.name: a
params.description: Compare part A

params.name: b
params.description: Compare part B

return.description: a number signifying if a should be before or after b

classitems.description:
Removes duplicates from the passed array and returns only the unique
values found in that array.
classitems.name: unique

params.name: array
params.description: the array to check for doubles

return.description: the array that only contains the unique values from the input array

classitems.description:
Makes sure that no embedded markup and tags can be created. Unwraps them using
JQuery.
classitems.name: removeDuplicatedTags

params.name: container
params.description: The container to check for embedded markup

classitems.description: Removes all remnants of tags using some more Regex magic
classitems.name: removeAllExistTag

params.name: txt
params.description: the text to remove the tags from

classitems.description: Recovers all the existing tags using some Regex magic.
classitems.name: recoverAllExistTag

params.name: txt
params.description: the string we want to recover tags from

return.description: returns the newValue string in which the existing tags have been replaced

classitems.description: Short hand for `markus.io.readFile`. Deprecated.
classitems.name: setup_reader

classitems.description:
Saves the current document and moves it to a new location. Another Shorthand
form, also deprecated?
classitems.name: saveAndMove

params.name: page
params.description: the url of the page you want to move to

classitems.description:
Searches through all functions and tries to return it using the provided
pnamed parameter. It passes the function in its context. I.e:
You pass the string `"markus.io.readFile"` and as a return you get
the function `readFile` as a member of the `markus.io` object.
classitems.name: searchFunctionByName

params.name: functionName
params.description: Name of the function, preferred including the namespace.

params.name: context
params.description: The object we're looking in.

return.description: Returns the string you queried by name as a member of its context.

classitems.description: A reference to the last clicked markup. Should this be in the Global namespace?
classitems.name: clickedMarkup

classitems.description:
A click handler for the `.doc` class from the document scope. It
removes any `.selected` class and hides the `popover`.

Handles the application cache events. If the application cache is ready for
an update, the application cache is swapped and the location is reloaded.
classitems.name: handleAppCache

classitems.description:
Function called before search. It hides the iframe of
the dictionary and shows the spinHolder.
classitems.name: _jobBeforeSearch

params.name: dictionary
params.description: The dictionary Object

classitems.description: Searches the dictionary for itself.
classitems.name: searchDictionary

params.name: dictionary
params.description: the passed dictionary parameter

classitems.description: All dictionaries are held in this one object
classitems.name: dictionaries

classitems.description:
Define a search function. Uses the webDict object to open the URL
specified in the dictionary object.
classitems.name: _search

params.name: dictionary
params.description: the dictionary object

classitems.description: Resizes the passed object to match the window height.
classitems.name: resize

params.name: obj
params.description: HTML object that has to match the window height

classitems.description: Sets all the parameters in a dictionary object to open the passed URL.
classitems.name: openURL

params.name: dictionary
params.description: the passed dictionary object

params.name: url
params.description: the URL string

classitems.description:
Searches through all dictionaries by looping through the object that
holds all defined dictionaries by key.
classitems.name: searchAllDictionary

classitems.description: Returns the specified webDictionary referenced by its name
classitems.name: getDictionary

params.name: web_dictionary_name
params.description: the name of the webDictionary you want to get

classitems.description: Registers a new Web Dictionary
classitems.name: registWebDictionary

classitems.description: Debounces the specified function call.
classitems.name: debouncer

params.name: func
params.description: the function you called and want to be debounced

params.name: timeout
params.description: the timeout of the debounce

classitems.description:
Defines what happens when you click on a tab. It shows the specified
tab, hides all webDicts, shows the correct one and triggers the
resetSize event.
ResetSize handler for the iframe of the Web Dictionary
ResetSize handler for the container of the Web Dictionary
Affix handler for the container of the Web Dictionary
Load handler for the iframe of the Web Dictionary. Handles initializing

removes any `.selected` class and hides the `popover`.

tab, hides all webDicts, shows the correct one and triggers the
resetSize event.
